testimonials.text: I recommend Elanchezhiyan for his exceptional skills in .NET development. His proficiency in coding, problem-solving, and dedication to delivering high-quality solutions make them an asset to any team.
testimonials.author: Arun Prasadh

testimonials.text: A strong leader with a problem-solving mindset. His contributions made a measurable impact on our projects.
testimonials.author: Shehab Rasheed

testimonials.text: Elanchezhiyan has demonstrated deep expertise in developing healthcare-related applications, including handling standards such as CCDA, FHIR, and compliance with HIPAA regulations. His technical acumen and domain knowledge make him a valuable contributor to any health IT project.
testimonials.author: Emanuel Mkrtichian
